subject: Religion & Spirituality
subcategory: Sacred Texts That Shaped the World
title: The Bible in American Politics
description: One-minute skill: The Bible in American Politics.

hook.text: Presidents swear on the Bible. Politicians quote it. Both left and right claim it supports their side. Who's right?

buildup.text: The Bible has been used to justify slavery and abolition, war and peace, capitalism and socialism. It bends to fit.

discovery.text: Martin Luther King Jr. used scripture to fight racism. Segregationists quoted the same Bible to defend it.

twist.text: The Bible doesn't have one political message. It has many. People find what they're looking for, not what's there.

climax.text: Sacred texts in politics become mirrors, not guides. They reflect the reader's beliefs back at them, amplified.

punchline.text: The Bible in politics is a mirror. People find what they brought.

quiz.question: How is the Bible used in American politics?
options: Both sides quote it to support opposing positions
